ovdesc.p: This application is used to Reverse out a sweep already run. The use of the V function and the group.id (from AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM) will reverse out the impact of a sweep process already run.

desc.p: The group.id (record id of AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM) of the sweep to be reversed.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
